Generation II.Gold: It likes playing mischievous tricks such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.
Generation II.Silver: It loves to bite and yank people's hair from behind without warning, just to see their shocked reactions.
Generation II.Crystal: It loves to watch people it's scared. It frightens them by screaming loudly or appearing suddenly.
Generation II.Stadium 2: It likes playing mischievous tricks such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night. Generation IV.Diamond: It loves to sneak up on people late at night, then startle them with its shrieklike cry.
Generation IV.Pearl: It gets nourishment from fear that it absorbs into its red orbs. In daytime, it sleeps in darkness.

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Misdreavus frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. The Pokémon apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fearful feelings of foes and turn them into nutrition.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Misdreavus frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. The Pokémon apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fearful feelings of foes and turn them into nutrition.

Generation VII.Sun: It will use any means necessary to frighten people and absorb their life energy. It practices constantly to hone its skill in causing fear.
Generation VII.Moon: If you hear a sobbing sound emanating from a vacant room, it's undoubtedly a bit of mischief from Misdreavus.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: What gives meaning to its life is surprising others. If you set your ear against the red orbs around its neck, you can hear shrieking.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: What makes it happy is imitating the voices of weeping people and scaring everyone. It doesn't deal well with folks who aren't easily frightened.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It loves to sneak up on people late at night and startle them with its shrieking cry.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It gets nourishment from fear that it absorbs into its red orbs. During the daytime, it sleeps in the shadows.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: It conceals itself in darkness, sending chills up travelers' spines with its childlike weeping. As it observes the frightened travelers with glee, the red orbs upon its chest let off an eerie light.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.
Generation IX.Violet: It loves to bite and yank people's hair from behind without warning, just to see their shocked reactions.
